not a file is selected.

Note: works using Linux GTK (I200405171219)

Grant,
why did you set the OS to GTK? As said in comment 2 it seems to work on GTK and
hence I would rather guess it's Motif ;-)

I see the problem on gtk with this morning's integration build.  The FileDialog 
on gtk seems to be the only one that will allow you to press OK while a file is 
not selected or typed in.
